WorkItem.Description:
"Unreadable content" problem occurs when some cells are merged and then one column is deleted.
 
Simplified test case is attached including test script, test file, generated file and xml error produced by Excel 2007. 
 
Problem occurs in latest version of PHPExcel  - 1.7.4.; tested on linux with PHP 5.1.6 and windows with PHP 5.2.14
WorkItem.Summary: Unreadable content when removing columns after merging cells
